pages.text: The Alloy Forge is a new crafting block based off the Blast Furnace, it allows you to bulk smelt ores, as well as craft new materials like $(l:contentcraft:basics/xaenon)Xaenon$() as well as $(l:contentcraft:basics/netherite_chunk)Netherite Chunks$().$(br2)$(6)$(l)TIP:$() you can use a mod like JEI to view all the recipes added by Contentcraft and other mods!
